elements.name: prolit-scope
elements.description: Add logic scope to the html elements below

attributes.name: debug
attributes.description: Enable debug mode (output debug information to the console)

attributes.name: init
attributes.description: Initialize component scope by evaluating a JSON/JS expression (supports await fetch, DOM access).

attributes.name: update-on
attributes.description: Set list of events (space-separated) that trigger a scope update. (e.g. click input change keyup)

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Load the template and scope from external HTML file (supports relative URLs)

elements.name: include
elements.description: Load and include an external HTML file into the current document

attributes.name: import-src
attributes.description: URL of the HTML file to include (supports relative URLs)
